1: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>there</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will be no</n> מוּעָף֮ <sup>4155 </sup> <n>Nevertheless the dimness</n> לַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>her who</n> מוּצָ֣ק <sup>4164 </sup> <n>[shall] not [be] such as [was] in her vexation</n> לָהּ֒ כָּעֵ֣ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>when</n> הָרִאשׁ֗וֹן <sup>7223 </sup> <n>at the first</n> הֵקַ֞ל <sup>7043 </sup> <n>he lightly afflicted</n> אַ֤רְצָה <sup>776 </sup> <n>the land</n> זְבֻלוּן֙ <sup>2074 </sup> <n>of Zebulun</n> וְאַ֣רְצָה <sup>776 </sup> <n>and the land</n> נַפְתָּלִ֔י <sup>5321 </sup> <n>of Naphtali</n> וְהָאַחֲר֖וֹן <sup>314 </sup> <n>and afterward</n> הִכְבִּ֑יד <sup>3513 </sup> <n>did more grievously afflict</n> דֶּ֤רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>[her by] the way</n> הַיָּם֙ <sup>3220 </sup> <n>of the sea</n> עֵ֣בֶר <sup>5676 </sup> <n>beyond</n> הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <sup>3383 </sup> <n>Jordan</n> גְּלִ֖יל <sup>1551 </sup> <n>in Galilee</n> הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of the nations</n>
2: הָעָם֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>The people</n> הַהֹלְכִ֣ים <sup>1980 </sup> <n>that walked</n> בַּחֹ֔שֶׁךְ <sup>2822 </sup> <n>in darkness</n> רָא֖וּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>have seen</n> א֣וֹר <sup>216 </sup> <n>light</n> גָּד֑וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>a great</n> יֹשְׁבֵי֙ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>they that dwell</n> בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> צַלְמָ֔וֶת <sup>6757 </sup> <n>of the shadow of death</n> א֖וֹר <sup>216 </sup> <n>upon them hath the light</n> נָגַ֥הּ <sup>5050 </sup> <n>shined</n> עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n>
3: הִרְבִּ֣יתָ <sup>7235 </sup> <n>Thou hast multiplied</n> הַגּ֔וֹי <sup>1471 </sup> <n>the nation</n> [לֹא כ] (לֹ֖ו <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> ק) הִגְדַּ֣לְתָּ <sup>1431 </sup> <n>[and] not increased</n> הַשִּׂמְחָ֑ה <sup>8057 </sup> <n>the joy</n> שָׂמְח֤וּ <sup>8055 </sup> <n>they joy</n> לְפָנֶ֙יךָ֙ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> כְּשִׂמְחַ֣ת <sup>8057 </sup> <n>thee according to the joy</n> בַּקָּצִ֔יר <sup>7105 </sup> <n>in harvest</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>men</n> יָגִ֖ילוּ <sup>1523 </sup> <n>[and] as [men] rejoice</n> בְּחַלְּקָ֥ם <sup>2505 </sup> <n>when they divide</n> שָׁלָֽל׃ <sup>7998 </sup> <n>the spoil</n>
4: כִּ֣י ׀ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֹ֣ל <sup>5923 </sup> <n>the yoke</n> סֻבֳּל֗וֹ <sup>5448 </sup> <n>of his burden</n> וְאֵת֙ <sup>853 </sup> מַטֵּ֣ה <sup>4294 </sup> <n>and the staff</n> שִׁכְמ֔וֹ <sup>7926 </sup> <n>of his shoulder</n> שֵׁ֖בֶט <sup>7626 </sup> <n>the rod</n> הַנֹּגֵ֣שׂ <sup>5065 </sup> <n>of his oppressor</n> בּ֑וֹ הַחִתֹּ֖תָ <sup>2865 </sup> <n>For thou hast broken</n> כְּי֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>as in the day</n> מִדְיָֽן׃ <sup>4080 </sup> <n>of Midian</n>
5: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>every</n> סְאוֹן֙ <sup>5430 </sup> <n>For every battle</n> סֹאֵ֣ן <sup>5431 </sup> <n>of the warrior</n> בְּרַ֔עַשׁ <sup>7494 </sup> <n>[is] with confused noise</n> וְשִׂמְלָ֖ה <sup>8071 </sup> <n>and garments</n> מְגוֹלָלָ֣ה <sup>1556 </sup> <n>rolled</n> בְדָמִ֑ים <sup>1818 </sup> <n>in blood</n> וְהָיְתָ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will be for</n> לִשְׂרֵפָ֖ה <sup>8316 </sup> <n>but [this] shall be with burning</n> מַאֲכֹ֥לֶת <sup>3980 </sup> <n>[and] fuel</n> אֵֽשׁ׃ <sup>784 </sup> <n>of fire</n>
6: כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> יֶ֣לֶד <sup>3206 </sup> <n>For unto us a child</n> יֻלַּד־ <sup>3205 </sup> <n>is born</n> לָ֗נוּ בֵּ֚ן <sup>1121 </sup> <n>unto us a son</n> נִתַּן־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>is given</n> לָ֔נוּ וַתְּהִ֥י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will rest</n> הַמִּשְׂרָ֖ה <sup>4951 </sup> <n>and the government</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> שִׁכְמ֑וֹ <sup>7926 </sup> <n>shall be upon his shoulder</n> וַיִּקְרָ֨א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>shall be called</n> שְׁמ֜וֹ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>and his name</n> פֶּ֠לֶא <sup>6382 </sup> <n>Wonderful</n> יוֹעֵץ֙ <sup>3289 </sup> <n>Counsellor</n> אֵ֣ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>God</n> גִּבּ֔וֹר <sup>1368 </sup> <n>The mighty</n> אֲבִיעַ֖ד <sup>5703 </sup> <n>The everlasting</n> שַׂר־ <sup>8269 </sup> <n>The Prince</n> שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <sup>7965 </sup> <n>of Peace</n>
7: [לְמַרְבֵּה כ] (לְמַרְבֵּ֨ה <sup>4766 </sup> <n>great</n> ק) הַמִּשְׂרָ֜ה <sup>4951 </sup> <n>of [his] government</n> וּלְשָׁל֣וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>and peace</n> אֵֽין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>There</n> קֵ֗ץ <sup>7093 </sup> <n>[there shall be] no end</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and over</n> כִּסֵּ֤א <sup>3678 </sup> <n>upon the throne</n> דָוִד֙ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>of David</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and over</n> מַמְלַכְתּ֔וֹ <sup>4467 </sup> <n>and upon his kingdom</n> לְהָכִ֤ין <sup>3559 </sup> <n>to order</n> אֹתָהּ֙ <sup>853 </sup> וּֽלְסַעֲדָ֔הּ <sup>5582 </sup> <n>it and to establish</n> בְּמִשְׁפָּ֖ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>it with judgment</n> וּבִצְדָקָ֑ה <sup>6666 </sup> <n>and with justice</n> מֵעַתָּה֙ <sup>6258 </sup> <n>then</n> וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>from henceforth even for</n> עוֹלָ֔ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>ever</n> קִנְאַ֛ת <sup>7068 </sup> <n>The zeal</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> צְבָא֖וֹת <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n> תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>will perform</n> זֹּֽאת׃ <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> ס
8: דָּבָ֛ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>a word</n> שָׁלַ֥ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>sent</n> אֲדֹנָ֖י <sup>136 </sup> <n>The Lord</n> בְּיַעֲקֹ֑ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>into Jacob</n> וְנָפַ֖ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>and it hath lighted</n> בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>upon Israel</n>
9: וְיָדְעוּ֙ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>shall know</n> הָעָ֣ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>And all the people</n> כֻּלּ֔וֹ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> אֶפְרַ֖יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>[even] Ephraim</n> וְיוֹשֵׁ֣ב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and the inhabitant</n> שֹׁמְר֑וֹן <sup>8111 </sup> <n>of Samaria</n> בְּגַאֲוָ֛ה <sup>1346 </sup> <n>in the pride</n> וּבְגֹ֥דֶל <sup>1433 </sup> <n>and stoutness</n> לֵבָ֖ב <sup>3824 </sup> <n>of heart</n> לֵאמֹֽר׃ <sup>559 </sup> <n>that say</n>
10: לְבֵנִ֥ים <sup>3843 </sup> <n>The bricks</n> נָפָ֖לוּ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>are fallen down</n> וְגָזִ֣ית <sup>1496 </sup> <n>with hewn stones</n> נִבְנֶ֑ה <sup>1129 </sup> <n>but we will build</n> שִׁקְמִ֣ים <sup>8256 </sup> <n>the sycomores</n> גֻּדָּ֔עוּ <sup>1438 </sup> <n>are cut down</n> וַאֲרָזִ֖ים <sup>730 </sup> <n>[them into] cedars</n> נַחֲלִֽיף׃ <sup>2498 </sup> <n>but we will change</n>
11: וַיְשַׂגֵּ֧ב <sup>7682 </sup> <n>shall set up</n> יְהוָ֛ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>Therefore the LORD</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> צָרֵ֥י <sup>6862 </sup> <n>the adversaries</n> רְצִ֖ין <sup>7526 </sup> <n>of Rezin</n> עָלָ֑יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֹיְבָ֖יו <sup>341 </sup> <n>his enemies</n> יְסַכְסֵֽךְ׃ <sup>5526 </sup> <n>together</n>
12: אֲרָ֣ם <sup>758 </sup> <n>The Syrians</n> מִקֶּ֗דֶם <sup>6924 </sup> <n>before</n> וּפְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <sup>6430 </sup> <n>and the Philistines</n> מֵֽאָח֔וֹר <sup>268 </sup> <n>behind</n> וַיֹּאכְל֥וּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>and they shall devour</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>gaping</n> פֶּ֑ה <sup>6310 </sup> <n>with open mouth</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> זֹאת֙ <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> שָׁ֣ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>is not turned away</n> אַפּ֔וֹ <sup>639 </sup> <n>For all this his anger</n> וְע֖וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>is still</n> יָד֥וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>but his hand</n> נְטוּיָֽה׃ <sup>5186 </sup> <n>[is] stretched out still</n>
13: וְהָעָ֥ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>For the people</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> שָׁ֖ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>turneth</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>who</n> הַמַּכֵּ֑הוּ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>not unto him that smiteth</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> צְבָא֖וֹת <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> דָרָֽשׁוּ׃ <sup>1875 </sup> <n>them neither do they seek</n> ס
14: וַיַּכְרֵ֨ת <sup>3772 </sup> <n>will cut off</n> יְהוָ֜ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>Therefore the LORD</n> מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>from Israel</n> רֹ֧אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>head</n> וְזָנָ֛ב <sup>2180 </sup> <n>and tail</n> כִּפָּ֥ה <sup>3712 </sup> <n>branch</n> וְאַגְמ֖וֹן <sup>100 </sup> <n>and rush</n> י֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>day</n> אֶחָֽד׃ <sup>259 </sup> <n>in one</n>
15: זָקֵ֥ן <sup>2205 </sup> <n>The ancient</n> וּנְשׂוּא־ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>accept</n> פָנִ֖ים <sup>6440 </sup> <n>accept</n> ה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> הָרֹ֑אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>[is] the head</n> וְנָבִ֥יא <sup>5030 </sup> <n>and the prophet</n> מֽוֹרֶה־ <sup>3384 </sup> <n>that teacheth</n> שֶּׁ֖קֶר <sup>8267 </sup> <n>lies</n> ה֥וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> הַזָּנָֽב׃ <sup>2180 </sup> <n>he [is] the tail</n>
16: וַיִּֽהְי֛וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> מְאַשְּׁרֵ֥י <sup>833 </sup> <n>For the leaders</n> הָֽעָם־ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of this people</n> הַזֶּ֖ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> מַתְעִ֑ים <sup>8582 </sup> <n>cause [them] to err</n> וּמְאֻשָּׁרָ֖יו <sup>833 </sup> <n>and [they that are] led</n> מְבֻלָּעִֽים׃ <sup>1104 </sup> <n>of them [are] destroyed</n>
17: עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כֵּ֨ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>in</n> בַּחוּרָ֜יו <sup>970 </sup> <n>in their young men</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> יִשְׂמַ֣ח ׀ <sup>8055 </sup> <n>shall have no joy</n> אֲדֹנָ֗י <sup>136 </sup> <n>Therefore the Lord</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְתֹמָ֤יו <sup>3490 </sup> <n>on their fatherless</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אַלְמְנֹתָיו֙ <sup>490 </sup> <n>and widows</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> יְרַחֵ֔ם <sup>7355 </sup> <n>neither shall have mercy</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> כֻלּוֹ֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>every</n> חָנֵ֣ף <sup>2611 </sup> <n>for every one [is] an hypocrite</n> וּמֵרַ֔ע <sup>7489 </sup> <n>and an evildoer</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>one</n> פֶּ֖ה <sup>6310 </sup> <n>and every mouth</n> דֹּבֵ֣ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>speaketh</n> נְבָלָ֑ה <sup>5039 </sup> <n>folly</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and every</n> זֹאת֙ <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> שָׁ֣ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>is not turned away</n> אַפּ֔וֹ <sup>639 </sup> <n>For all this his anger</n> וְע֖וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>is still</n> יָד֥וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>but his hand</n> נְטוּיָֽה׃ <sup>5186 </sup> <n>[is] stretched out still</n>
18: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> בָעֲרָ֤ה <sup>1197 </sup> <n>burneth</n> כָאֵשׁ֙ <sup>784 </sup> <n>as the fire</n> רִשְׁעָ֔ה <sup>7564 </sup> <n>For wickedness</n> שָׁמִ֥יר <sup>8068 </sup> <n>the briers</n> וָשַׁ֖יִת <sup>7898 </sup> <n>and thorns</n> תֹּאכֵ֑ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>it shall devour</n> וַתִּצַּת֙ <sup>3341 </sup> <n>and shall kindle</n> בְּסִֽבְכֵ֣י <sup>5442 </sup> <n>in the thickets</n> הַיַּ֔עַר <sup>3293 </sup> <n>of the forest</n> וַיִּֽתְאַבְּכ֖וּ <sup>55 </sup> <n>and they shall mount up</n> גֵּא֥וּת <sup>1348 </sup> <n>[like] the lifting up</n> עָשָֽׁן׃ <sup>6227 </sup> <n>of smoke</n>
19: בְּעֶבְרַ֛ת <sup>5678 </sup> <n>Through the wrath</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> צְבָא֖וֹת <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n> נֶעְתַּ֣ם <sup>6272 </sup> <n>darkened</n> אָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>is the land</n> וַיְהִ֤י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> הָעָם֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and the people</n> כְּמַאֲכֹ֣לֶת <sup>3980 </sup> <n>shall be as the fuel</n> אֵ֔שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>of the fire</n> אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>no man</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אָחִ֖יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>his brother</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>No</n> יַחְמֹֽלוּ׃ <sup>2550 </sup> <n>shall spare</n>
20: וַיִּגְזֹ֤ר <sup>1504 </sup> <n>And he shall snatch</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> יָמִין֙ <sup>3225 </sup> <n>on the right hand</n> וְרָעֵ֔ב <sup>7456 </sup> <n>but are hungry</n> וַיֹּ֥אכַל <sup>398 </sup> <n>and he shall eat</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> שְׂמֹ֖אול <sup>8040 </sup> <n>on the left hand</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>are not</n> שָׂבֵ֑עוּ <sup>7646 </sup> <n>and they shall not be satisfied</n> אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every man</n> בְּשַׂר־ <sup>1320 </sup> <n>the flesh</n> זְרֹע֖וֹ <sup>2220 </sup> <n>of his own arm</n> יֹאכֵֽלוּ׃ <sup>398 </sup> <n>they shall eat</n>
21: מְנַשֶּׁ֣ה <sup>4519 </sup> <n>Manasseh</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֶפְרַ֗יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>Ephraim</n> וְאֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <sup>669 </sup> <n>and Ephraim</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <sup>4519 </sup> <n>Manasseh</n> יַחְדָּ֥ו <sup>3162 </sup> <n>[and] they together</n> הֵ֖מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>they</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>are against</n> יְהוּדָ֑ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>[shall be] against Judah</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> זֹאת֙ <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> שָׁ֣ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>is not turned away</n> אַפּ֔וֹ <sup>639 </sup> <n>For all this his anger</n> וְע֖וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>is still</n> יָד֥וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>but his hand</n> נְטוּיָֽה׃ <sup>5186 </sup> <n>[is] stretched out still</n> ס
